name: WCS Web Conferencing Solutions
overview:
Web conferencing, video conferencing and webcasting presents organizations and individuals the opportunity to extend their communication reach - for sales & marketing, training, meetings, collaboration, etc. - while reducing costs and environmental impact. Whether you are looking to produce a one-time event or considering a full in-house installation, WCS can assist with all your remote conferencing needs.

WCS offers live and on-demand event production and internet broadcasting services. Whether you are an independent instructor wanting to produce a training program, or a large organization wanting to communicate your message to thousands, WCS can produce and broadcast your message, event or training program online - live or as a recorded program for 24/7 on-demand viewing.
